xxx.id AS id, xxx.stock_po_id AS stockPoId, xxx.stock_po_code AS stockPoCode, xxx.out_stock_id AS outStockId, xxx.out_stock_code AS outStockCode, xxx.out_stock_name AS outStockName, xxx.in_stock_id AS inStockId, xxx.in_stock_code AS inStockCode, xxx.in_stock_name AS inStockName, xxx.material_id AS materialId, xxx.customer_code AS customerCode, xxx.material_code AS materialCode, xxx.material_short_name AS materialShortName, xxx.material_spec AS materialSpec, xxx.model AS model, xxx.qty AS qty, xxx.allot_qty AS allotQty, xxx.f_pallet AS fPallet, xxx.f_finished AS fFinished, xxx.f_count AS fCount, xxx.units_id AS unitsId, xxx.state AS state, xxx.f_company_id AS fCompanyId, xxx.f_en_code AS fEnCode, xxx.f_short_name AS fShortName, xxx.create_id AS createId, xxx.create_name AS createName, xxx.create_time AS createTime, xxx.update_id AS updateId, xxx.update_name AS updateName, xxx.update_time AS updateTime, xxx.remark AS remark, xxx.is_valid AS isValid, xxx.stock_current_sum_id AS stockCurrentSumId, xxx.stock_current_id AS stockCurrentId, xxx.out_stock_place_id AS outStockPlaceId, xxx.out_stock_place_code AS outStockPlaceCode, xxx.out_stock_place_name AS outStockPlaceName, xxx.in_stock_place_id AS inStockPlaceId, xxx.in_stock_place_code AS inStockPlaceCode, xxx.in_stock_place_name AS inStockPlaceName, xxx.units_name AS unitsName, xxx.in_batch_no AS inBatchNo, xxx.batch_no AS batchNo, xxx.suppliar_id AS suppliarId, xxx.suppliar_code AS suppliarCode, xxx.suppliar_name AS suppliarName,
mapper.select:
select
from mes_wms_stockpolist
is_valid = '1'
and id = #{id}
and stock_po_id = #{stockPoId}
and stock_po_code like concat('%',#{stockPoCode},'%')
and out_stock_id = #{outStockId}
and out_stock_code like concat('%',#{outStockCode},'%')
and out_stock_name like concat('%',#{outStockName},'%')
and in_stock_id = #{inStockId}
and in_stock_code like concat('%',#{inStockCode},'%')
and in_stock_name like concat('%',#{inStockName},'%')
and material_id = #{materialId}
and customer_code like concat('%',#{customerCode},'%')
and material_code like concat('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and material_short_name like concat('%',#{materialShortName},'%')
and material_spec like concat('%',#{materialSpec},'%')
and model like concat('%',#{model},'%')
and qty
and allot_qty
and f_pallet
and f_finished
and f_count = #{fCount}
and units_id = #{unitsId}
and state like concat('%',#{state},'%')
and f_company_id = #{fCompanyId}
and f_en_code like concat('%',#{fEnCode},'%')
and f_short_name like concat('%',#{fShortName},'%')
and create_id = #{createId}
and create_name like concat('%',#{createName},'%')
and create_time
and update_id = #{updateId}
and update_name like concat('%',#{updateName},'%')
and update_time
and remark like concat('%',#{remark},'%')
and is_valid like concat('%',#{isValid},'%')
and stock_current_sum_id = #{stockCurrentSumId}
and stock_current_id = #{stockCurrentId}
and out_stock_place_id = #{outStockPlaceId}
and out_stock_place_code like concat('%',#{outStockPlaceCode},'%')
and out_stock_place_name like concat('%',#{outStockPlaceName},'%')
and in_stock_place_id = #{inStockPlaceId}
and in_stock_place_code like concat('%',#{inStockPlaceCode},'%')
and in_stock_place_name like concat('%',#{inStockPlaceName},'%')
and units_name like concat('%',#{unitsName},'%')
and in_batch_no like concat('%',#{inBatchNo},'%')
and batch_no like concat('%',#{batchNo},'%')
and suppliar_id = #{suppliarId}
and suppliar_code like concat('%',#{suppliarCode},'%')
and suppliar_name like concat('%',#{suppliarName},'%')
order by id desc

select id, stock_po_id, stock_po_code, out_stock_id, out_stock_code, out_stock_name, in_stock_id, in_stock_code, in_stock_name, material_id, customer_code, material_code, material_short_name, material_spec, model, qty, allot_qty, f_pallet, f_finished, f_count, units_id, state, f_company_id, f_en_code, f_short_name, create_id, create_name, create_time, update_id, update_name, update_time, remark, is_valid, stock_current_sum_id, stock_current_id, out_stock_place_id, out_stock_place_code, out_stock_place_name, in_stock_place_id, in_stock_place_code, in_stock_place_name, units_name, in_batch_no, batch_no, suppliar_id, suppliar_code, suppliar_name from mes_wms_stockpolist where id = #{id}
